info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:03PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN KERN COUNTY THROUGH 730 PM PDT... At 701 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tehachapi moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail, isolated heavy rainfall, and frequent dangerous lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Localized heavy rainfall may result in nuisance flooding. Frequent dangerous lightning occuring. Locations impacted include... Tehachapi, Stallion Springs, Golden Hills, Keene, Bear Valley Springs, and Water Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
